title: What is a piezoelectric sensor? - Quora

response.answer_text: A piezoelectric sensor is a device that uses the piezoelectric effect, to measure changes in pressure, acceleration, temperature, strain, or force by converting them to an electrical charge. The prefix piezo- is Greek for 'press' or 'squeeze'.

Piezoelectric crystal is one when applied pressure on the two opposite sides of it voltage difference generated between the two sides.this concept s used to produce electricity by vibration or say by pressure.
